text: Jose Manuel Gonzalez Santamaria (born September 19, 1970 in Asturias) is a track and field athlete from Spain. He has a disability: He has cerebral palsy and is a T36 type athlete. He raced at the 1996 Summer Paralympics, the 2000 Summer Paralympics, the 2004 Summer Paralympics, the 2008 Summer Paralympics and the 2012 Summer Paralympics. He was the third runner to finish in the 400 meter T37 race. == References == Category:Spanish middle-distance runners Category:Living people Category:1970 births Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:1996 Summer Paralympics Category:2000 Summer Paralympics Category:2004 Summer Paralympics Category:2008 Summer Paralympics Category:2012 Summer Paralympics Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type T36 Category:People from Asturias
title: José Manuel González Santamaria
